rule.description: Use of a broken or risky cryptographic algorithm
rule.name: cpp/weak-cryptographic-algorithm

message.text:
This file makes use of a broken or weak cryptographic algorithm (specified by call to RC4_set_key).
This file makes use of a broken or weak cryptographic algorithm (specified by call to RC4).
